import React from "react"; import css from "@emotion/css"; import moment from "moment"; import { COLORS } from "../../../constants"; import Modal from "../profile-modals/updateProfile"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faUser, faUserCircle, faPen, faMarsDouble, faBirthdayCake, faUserLock, faTv, faBuilding, faSuitcase, faCalendar, faCalendarCheck, faPassport, faHashtag, faAward, faSearch, faEdit, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; const LeftInfo = ({ isProfileData }) => { const pData = isProfileData && isProfileData.profile; console.log(pData); return (
p { display: block; margin-right: 10px; } & > p > span { float: left; width: 48%; border-bottom: 1px solid ${COLORS.GRAY}; padding: 8px 0px; color: ${COLORS.BLACK}; } & > p > span > svg { margin-right: 4px; } `} > {pData && pData.length > 0 && pData.map((item) => (

Name {item.firstName} First Name - Last Name {item.lastName} Gender {item.gender} Date of Birth {moment(item.dateOfBirth).format("DD/MM/YYYY")} Father Name {item.fatherName} Employee Type {item.employeeType} Association Type {item.associationType} Designation {item.designation} Date of Joining {moment(item.dateOfJoining).format("DD/MM/YYYY")} Date of Leaving - Aadhar Card No. {item.aadharNo} PAN Card No. {item.panCardNo} JNTUA No. {item.jntuhID} AICTE No. {item.aicteId} Achievements {item.achievements} Research Activities {item.researchActivities}

))}
); }; export default LeftInfo;
